title: Back from the road
description: Fresh back from touring the US with Rally North America we squeeze in a podcast before Matt and Thad head back to New York for more filming.  This week we recap Rally North America, a trip up Pikes Peak, review the Jeep Grand Cherokee SRT, talk about the newly rumoured flat-plane crank Mustang GT 350, shark attacks on our home beaches while Blake Rong of Autoweek and Hooniverse sits in for the first half of the show.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: Fresh back from touring the US with Rally North America we squeeze in a podcast before Matt and Thad head back to New York for more filming.  This week we recap Rally North America, a trip up Pikes Peak, review the Jeep Grand Cherokee SRT, talk about the newly rumoured flat-plane crank Mustang GT 350, shark attacks on our home beaches while Blake Rong of Autoweek and Hooniverse sits in for the first half of the show.
